title: Hello World
summary: Kicking off my new portfolio blog with Contentlayer and MDX.

body.raw:
Welcome to my new blog! This site is built with Next.js, Tailwind, and **Contentlayer**.

## What to expect

- Project write-ups
- Short tips & notes
- Occasional deep dives

Thanks for reading!
